config.debug.name: Debug Mode
config.debug.tooltip: Shows the current speed buff above the player's head.
config.adaptive.name: Adaptive Mode
config.adaptive.tooltip:
If true, speed changes based on time of day.
If false, uses constant speed.
config.constant_speed.name: Added Speed (+)
config.constant_speed.tooltip: Amount of speed to add (1 to 20).
config.adaptive.note: These settings only apply if 'Adaptive Mode' is checked above.
